ygData.subject: Solusek
ygData.msgSnippet: You went there at lvl 20?  With how many people in your group?  Did you talk to the gnomes and check for any info?  For the heck of it, I did a /who all gnome
ygData.messageBody:
You went there at lvl 20? With how many people in your group? Did you talk
to the gnomes and check for any info? For the heck of it, I did a /who all
gnome 40 50 and found one at lvl 43 and asked him about solusek. He said
he's been there and talked to the gnomes and they didn't have any tinkering
information. But he said he doesn't tinker so he wasn't specifically
looking for that kind of info.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

----- Original Message -----
From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 11:12 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I know...


> From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
>
> Sol A is the one with the gnomes. It is a serverly underutilized level
20-30
> dungeon. For some reason no one really goes there. But as the only group
there
> my friends and I spent level 20-27 there and leveled very quickly and
relatively
> safely. There was rarely more then us 4-6 people in the zone. Maybe 10
people
> at the most.
